content: He uses a spiked mace to attack and generally will perform a series of combos where he'll swing the mace, or leap up in the air and smash it down.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Field_of_Fire_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Field of Fire Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Ashen Pass III' and the sub-subsection 'Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai'.
The content is as follows:
He uses a spiked mace to attack and generally will perform a series of combos where he'll swing the mace, or leap up in the air and smash it down.
